TopicTitle: TMA-1 Orbital Orb. Bestow it stock-ship! ...please

Articles.Content:
Please Check out this part TMA-1 Orbital Orb...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64442-Habitat-Pack

It COULD, should, please? be stock. I want to marry it. I want it to have my babies.

Inside:

I've been playing with this inflatable part pack a lot since I became aware of it. And its an excellent pack. It's very "stock-looking" and blends nicely with the game. (Highly Recommend Checking out the mod for its inflatables and gravity wheel) I understand Mods have their place to expand the game. but please consider honoring this particular part by bestowing it stock-ship !

All Images from my STOCK game using only this mod. most things only using the Orbital Orb:

https://plus.google.com/photos/107877770903043236735/albums/5965534492055093889
